definition: many/much/often/a lot of/numerous/more/in excess/how (to what extent)/multi-/Taiwan pr. [duo2] when it means "how"
face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc

sentences.english: It is like a polyhedron with many sides.
sentences.chinese: 可以說是一個多方面綜合的多面體。

sentences.english: A cube is a regular solid.
Knot invariant is an important means to study polyhedral links.
sentences.chinese: 紐結不變量是研究多面體鏈環的主要工具。

sentences.english: The jointed density function of two angles is developed for recognition of polyhedral objects.
sentences.chinese: 利用投影角度的聯合概率函數可識別多面體。

sentences.english: Every simple polyhedron is further divided into tetrahedrons.
sentences.chinese: 每個簡單多面體進一步剖分爲四面體。

sentences.english: An algorithm for computing the minimum distance between two convex polyhedra is presented.
sentences.chinese: 提出的算法，用於計算兩個凸多面體之間的最小距離。

sentences.english: Using the knowledge of abstract algebra, the rotation groups of the regular polyhedron are determined.
sentences.chinese: 通過抽象代數知識，求出所有正多面體的旋轉羣。

sentences.english: Finally, carried out the stopped search procedure in the polyhedrons on the slices.
sentences.chinese: 最後，在片上的這些凸多面體上執行阻止搜尋程序。

sentences.english: Polyhedra with seven vertices are rare .
sentences.chinese: 具有七個頂點的多面體是稀少的。

sentences.english: The paper investigate the applications of algorithms for best approximation from polyhedrons in isotonic regression.
sentences.chinese: 研究了多面體最佳逼近算法在保序迴歸中的應用。

sentences.english: It is a new brand subject to investigate the polyhedrons of DNA.
sentences.chinese: DNA多面體的研究是目前一個新穎的課題。

sentences.english: Be-sides, other types of cubo-polyhedron are also observed for the first time.
sentences.chinese: 此外還首次觀察到其它幾種立方多面體晶形。

sentences.english: Diameter of the isometric particle is 33 nm.
sentences.chinese: 病毒顆粒呈等軸多面體，直徑爲33毫微米。

sentences.english: Each of these perfect polyhedra would be in turn composed of triangles.
sentences.chinese: 每一個理想的多面體是依次由三角形組成。

sentences.english: This paper proposes a new approach to robust polyhedral Boolean set operations.
sentences.chinese: 提出一種可靠的多面體布爾集合運算方案。

sentences.english: Recall that the optimal solution is always on one of the vertices of the polyhedron created by the feasible region.
sentences.chinese: 最佳解通常都是其可行域所構成的多面體的一個頂點。

definition: lit. the river that divides Chu and Han/fig. a line that divides rival territories/the mid-line between sides on a Chinese chessboard
to make a significant advance in one's career (idiom)/to get one's big break
(idiom) to freely air one's views/to be heard far and wide/to attract a lot of attention
